Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute at Commercial/103rd
ShortDescription: 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via Torrence, 100th and Commercial : due to, street blockage near Commercial/103rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Torrence, 100th, Commercial and over regular route, due to street blockage near Commercial/103rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark and #152 Addison Temporary Reroute near Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: 22 Clark and 152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to Cubs game near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark and #152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to a Cubs game near Clark/Addison.

#22 Clark buses will operate via Clark, Racine, Belmont, then resume their normal route on Clark.

#152 Addison buses will operate via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted, then resume their normal route on Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Northbound Reroute near 71st/Jeffery
ShortDescription: Northbound 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, South Shore, 67th, Stony Island and 71st: due to, police activity near 71st/Jeffery.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, South Shore, 67th, Stony Island, 71st and over regular route, due to police activity near 71st/Jeffery.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
